lines.text: What about that Emergency Exit thing?
Well... to use it, you need a fire around, so the wizard started a fire first...
Slow down, kid. What you're gettin' at is that the <c=#FF00FF>fire</c> killed him?
Right! The wizard cast Emergency Exit to escape, and the fire got over to the robber, and-
Hold it. This magic stuff you're on about is a whole different can of eggs.
What I mean is, if you think it was the fire, just <c=#FF00FF>say so.</c> Don't go gettin' magic involved before we need to.
<f=OpenDyslexicSmall>Kids these days, with their rap music and their sequence breaking...</f>
